basics.name: Rachel Thompson
basics.label: Digital Marketing Manager
basics.summary: Results-driven Digital Marketing Manager with 8+ years of experience in developing and executing comprehensive marketing strategies. Proven track record of increasing brand visibility, driving user acquisition, and optimizing conversion rates. Expert in SEO, content marketing, and marketing analytics.

work.name: Digital Growth Agency
work.summary: Leading digital marketing strategies for Fortune 500 clients
highlights: Increased client ROI by average of 150% through optimized marketing campaigns
Managed $5M+ annual marketing budget across multiple channels
Led team of 8 marketing specialists and 3 content creators
Implemented attribution modeling increasing conversion accuracy by 40%

work.name: MarketBoost Inc
work.summary: Managed B2B marketing campaigns and strategy
highlights: Grew organic traffic by 200% through SEO and content optimization
Launched successful ABM program resulting in 45% increase in enterprise deals
Reduced customer acquisition cost by 35% through channel optimization

work.name: TechStart Marketing
work.summary: Executed digital marketing campaigns for tech startups
highlights: Managed social media presence growing followers from 10K to 100K
Created content strategy increasing blog traffic by 300%
Implemented marketing automation reducing response time by 60%

projects.name: Global Brand Expansion Campaign
projects.description: Led international market entry strategy for major tech client
